meta.job_title: PSE CTS Hot Section Group Lead

duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the Customer Technical Services (CTS) team supporting P&W partnership programs with Hot Section Hardware.
Use MRO and Program data to help with prioritization of cases across hardware.
Collaborate with Engineering and Program to align on technical topics.
Foster group cohesion within and across all CTS Groups.
Conduct meaningful 1:1’s with group members on a regular basis.
Assist in recruiting, interviewing, training, and long term departmental planning.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in relevant field (Mechanical, Aerospace, Manufacturing Engineering)  (Master's preferred)
